name: Build-Around (Prototype)
description:
A puzzle-platformer prototype. Rearrange the blocks that make up each level to get the AI platforming-bot to the goal! Requires HTML5 and uses the mouse.

HOW TO PLAY: Click on a green tile to pick it up. You can carry as many as you want. Click somewhere else to put a green tile down. Watch the platform-bot's behavior patterns and place the blocks strategically so he can reach the Goal.

This game's about problem-solving, so there are multiple solutions for each of the 3 levels. Feedback is appreciated. Enjoy!
